data.name: NinjaThea
data.detailed_description:
Mischievous critters have stolen all the fruit from the local grocery store. It's up to you, brave little NinjaThea, to punish the critters and gather all the fruit as fast as you can.

As short and simple 2D platformer, inspired by the creativity and imagination of a 4-year old little girl.

Run, jump and slash your way across 7 different stages, collecting a variety of fruit while avoiding traps and evil critters. Your every run is timed, so you ca go back and try to best yourself. Good luck!
data.about_the_game:
Mischievous critters have stolen all the fruit from the local grocery store. It's up to you, brave little NinjaThea, to punish the critters and gather all the fruit as fast as you can.

As short and simple 2D platformer, inspired by the creativity and imagination of a 4-year old little girl.

Run, jump and slash your way across 7 different stages, collecting a variety of fruit while avoiding traps and evil critters. Your every run is timed, so you ca go back and try to best yourself. Good luck!
data.short_description: Casual 2D platformer with a cute ninja girl theme.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.5GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
